doc.title: Hoop-Dee-Doo: It's a Wiggly Party
doc.plot: The Wiggles first-ever DVD! This DVD features 55 minutes of the group's original and catchy music and humorous sets, that toddlers and preschoolers both adore. The story finds Greg, Jeff, Anthony and Murray Wiggle all getting ready for a party with their friends Captain Feathersword, Dorothy the Dinosaur, Wags the Dog and Henry the Octopus. As the fun continues, The Wiggles introduce children to musical instruments, different animals, cultures from other countries and more. Some songs included here are: "Move Like An Emu," "La Cucaracha" "Captain's Magic Buttons," and "Fun On The Farm." Included almost as a bonus is a skit featuring CGI animation of The Wiggles as cavemen in a prehistoric setting, watch out for the dinosaurs!
